questions.question: What types of construction projects do you provide estimates for?
questions.answer: We provide estimates for all types of construction projects including commercial buildings, residential homes, industrial facilities, MEP systems, renovations, and specialty trades. Our team has experience across all construction sectors.

questions.question: How accurate are your estimates?
questions.answer: Our estimates are highly accurate with a typical variance of Â±5-10%. We use industry-standard software, current material pricing, and our extensive database of historical project costs to ensure precision.

questions.question: Do you work with contractors outside of Virginia?
questions.answer: Yes, we work with contractors, builders, and architects nationwide. Our digital process allows us to serve clients across the United States efficiently.

questions.question: What information do I need to provide for an estimate?
questions.answer: We need your project plans (architectural, structural, MEP), specifications, scope of work, project location, and timeline. The more detailed information you provide, the more accurate our estimate will be.

questions.question: How much do your estimating services cost?
questions.answer: Our pricing starts at $199 for single trade estimates. We offer monthly packages starting at $1,499 for multiple projects, and dedicated estimator services with custom pricing. Contact us for a detailed quote based on your specific needs.

questions.question: Do you offer payment plans?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer flexible payment options including upfront payment, milestone-based payments, and monthly billing for our package clients. We accept all major credit cards, checks, and ACH transfers.

questions.question: Is there a discount for multiple projects?
questions.answer: Yes, our monthly packages offer significant savings for clients with multiple projects. We also provide volume discounts for large contractors and repeat clients.

questions.question: What's included in the estimate price?
questions.answer: Our estimate includes detailed material takeoffs, labor calculations, equipment costs, overhead and profit margins, and a comprehensive report. Revisions and consultations are included in the base price.

questions.question: How long does it take to complete an estimate?
questions.answer: Most estimates are completed within 24-48 hours. Complex projects may take 3-5 business days. Rush jobs can be accommodated for an additional fee with same-day or next-day delivery.

questions.question: What is your estimating process?
questions.answer: Our process includes: 1) Plan review and scope analysis, 2) Material takeoffs using industry software, 3) Labor and equipment calculations, 4) Market pricing research, 5) Quality review, and 6) Final report delivery with consultation.

questions.question: Can you work with tight deadlines?
questions.answer: Yes, we understand the construction industry's fast pace. We offer expedited services for urgent projects and can often accommodate same-day requests for an additional rush fee.

questions.question: Do you provide progress updates during the estimating process?
questions.answer: Yes, we provide regular updates on project status and will communicate immediately if we encounter any issues or need additional information.

questions.question: What file formats do you accept?
questions.answer: We accept PDF, DWG, DXF, and most CAD file formats. We can also work with hand-drawn plans, though digital files are preferred for accuracy and speed.

questions.question: What estimating software do you use?
questions.answer: We use industry-leading software including PlanSwift, Bluebeam, and specialized trade software. Our tools ensure accuracy and allow for detailed takeoffs and calculations.

questions.question: Can you integrate with my project management software?
questions.answer: Yes, we can export our estimates in various formats compatible with most project management and accounting software including QuickBooks, Sage, and Procore.

questions.question: Do you provide digital takeoffs?
questions.answer: Yes, all our takeoffs are digital and we can provide detailed quantity reports, marked-up plans, and digital files showing our measurements and calculations.

questions.question: What if I need revisions to the estimate?
questions.answer: Minor revisions are included in our service. Major scope changes or additional trades may incur additional fees. We'll discuss any potential charges before proceeding with revisions.

questions.question: Do you provide ongoing support after delivery?
questions.answer: Yes, we provide consultation and support for questions about the estimate. We're available via phone, email, and live chat during business hours.

questions.question: What if the estimate doesn't match my budget?
questions.answer: We can work with you to value engineer the project, suggest alternative materials or methods, or break down the estimate to help identify areas for cost savings.

questions.question: Is my project information confidential?
questions.answer: Absolutely. We maintain strict confidentiality for all client projects and can sign NDAs when required. Your project information is secure and never shared with competitors.
